headline.main: Fighting Rages in Yemen as U.N. Seeks to Extend 72-Hour Ceasefire
headline.print_headline: Fighting Rages in Yemen as U.N. Seeks to Extend 72-Hour Ceasefire

docs.snippet: Saudi-backed government forces and Iran-allied Houthis in Yemen accused each other of violating a ceasefire on Saturday as the United Nations tried to extend the three-day truce....
docs.lead_paragraph: Saudi-backed government forces and Iran-allied Houthis in Yemen accused each other of violating a ceasefire on Saturday as the United Nations tried to extend the three-day truce.

headline.main: World Cup-Winning Coach Lippi Appointed China Manager
headline.print_headline: World Cup-Winning Coach Lippi Appointed China Manager

docs.snippet: World Cup-winning manager Marcello Lippi has been named as coach of China's national team, the Chinese Football Association (CFA) said on its website on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: World Cup-winning manager Marcello Lippi has been named as coach of China's national team, the Chinese Football Association (CFA) said on its website on Saturday.

headline.main: Radwanska Hoping for Luck and Pluck in WTA Finals Defense
headline.print_headline: Radwanska Hoping for Luck and Pluck in WTA Finals Defense

docs.snippet: Agnieszka Radwanska returns to the scene of her greatest triumph next week when she opens the defense of her WTA Finals title and the 27-year-old Pole is the first to admit that luck can be as important as skill to emerge victorious in Singapore....
docs.lead_paragraph: Agnieszka Radwanska returns to the scene of her greatest triumph next week when she opens the defense of her WTA Finals title and the 27-year-old Pole is the first to admit that luck can be as important as skill to emerge victorious in Singapore.

headline.main: Senior Egyptian General Shot Dead Outside Home
headline.print_headline: Senior Egyptian General Shot Dead Outside Home

docs.snippet: A senior Egyptian military official was shot dead on Saturday outside his home on the outskirts of Cairo, security sources and his wife said...

headline.main: Want to Explore Iceland? An Airline Has a Buddy Who Can Help
headline.print_headline: A New ‘Friend’ to Show You Around

docs.snippet: For passengers who stop over in Iceland, Icelandair has devised a buddy program in which employees help visitors explore the country (the fishing’s fine)....
docs.lead_paragraph: For passengers who stop over in Iceland, Icelandair has devised a buddy program in which employees help visitors explore the country (the fishing’s fine).

headline.main: How to Get a Deal at Local Markets
headline.print_headline: Shop for Memories at Local Markets

docs.snippet: For travelers in search of good prices at local markets, look for handmade items, prepare to bargain — and don’t forget airport shopping....

headline.main: Merkel's Bavarian Allies Back Her for Fourth Term
headline.print_headline: Merkel's Bavarian Allies Back Her for Fourth Term

docs.snippet: German Chancellor Angela Merkel's Bavarian allies will back her if she decides to run for a fourth term next year, a member of the Christian Social Union (CSU) said on Saturday, signalling a possible end of a row over migration among conservatives...
docs.lead_paragraph: German Chancellor Angela Merkel's Bavarian allies will back her if she decides to run for a fourth term next year, a member of the Christian Social Union (CSU) said on Saturday, signalling a possible end of a row over migration among conservatives.

headline.main: Lahiri Surges Clear in Pursuit of Maiden PGA Tour Title
headline.print_headline: Lahiri Surges Clear in Pursuit of Maiden PGA Tour Title

docs.snippet: Anirban Lahiri moved into position to record a first PGA Tour victory when the Indian fired an exquisite third round seven-under 65 at the TPC Kuala Lumpur course to storm four shots clear of the field at the CIMB Classic on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anirban Lahiri moved into position to record a first PGA Tour victory when the Indian fired an exquisite third round seven-under 65 at the TPC Kuala Lumpur course to storm four shots clear of the field at the CIMB Classic on Saturday.

headline.main: Jessica Korda Shoots 66, Catches Minjee Lee in Blue Bay LPGA
headline.print_headline: Jessica Korda Shoots 66, Catches Minjee Lee in Blue Bay LPGA

docs.snippet: Jessica Korda caught Minjee Lee on Saturday in the Blue Bay LPGA. Ariya Jutanugarn made up even more ground to move into contention for her sixth victory of the season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jessica Korda caught Minjee Lee on Saturday in the Blue Bay LPGA. Ariya Jutanugarn made up even more ground to move into contention for her sixth victory of the season.
